# Generating Betakurve Parameter



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
beta_par <- function(mu, sigma) {
  mu <- max(mu, 1E-6)
  sigma <- max(sigma, 1E-6)
  a_b <- mu * (1 - mu) / sigma^2 - 1  # calc alpha + beta
  a_b <- max(a_b,1E-6)
  #a_b <- abs(a_b)
  a <- mu * a_b
  b <- (1 - mu) * a_b
  return(list(alpha = a, beta = b, a_b))
}
10E-4
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] 0.001
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
beta_par(mu = 0.5, sigma = 0.1)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
$alpha
[1] 12

$beta
[1] 12

[[3]]
[1] 24
```


:::
:::



# Generating random values



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
gen_rbeta <- function(n = n,
                      mu = mu, 
                      sigma = sigma
                      ) {
  par <- beta_par(mu = mu, sigma = sigma)
  data <- rbeta(n = 1000, 
                shape1 = par$alpha, 
                shape2 = par$beta)
  data <- sort(data)

  return(data)
}

data <- gen_rbeta(mu = 0.1, sigma = 0.05)
beta_par(mu = 0.1, sigma = 0.05)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
$alpha
[1] 3.5

$beta
[1] 31.5

[[3]]
[1] 35
```


:::

